title: Spicy Indian chicken
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon ginger garlic paste', '2 green chillies, chopped', '2 1/2 dessertspoons ground coriander', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '500g (1 1/4 lb) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, diced', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', 'handful chopped fresh coriander, for garnish', 'salt to taste']
